channel.title: Diagonal white line
channel.description:
How to get rid of this white diagonal line? I launched the game for the first time, changed the resolution and then... this appeared... Is somebody having the same issue?
[url]https://tinyurl.com/8z5dfzc[/url]
Thank you if you can help me.

item.title: Diagonal white line
item.dc:creator: Nikomako
item.description:
billiam:

ok i had the same problem, just uncheck the “Enable HUD post process”

It worked, thank you! (@Mod, you can change the title to [solved])

Read full topic
